analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo ceva noāsavo ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca na kusalam dhammam paccayā sa āsavaḥ ca iva no āsavaḥ ca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca na akusalam dhammam paccayā āsavaḥ ca iva sa āsavaḥ ca akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
